name: opencors
description: OpenCORS is a simple NodeJS based CORS Proxy

scripts.build-win: del /S /Q .\dist\* && tsc -p tsconfig-mjs.json && tsc -p tsconfig-cjs.json && echo {"type": "commonjs"}>dist\cjs\package.json && echo {"type": "module"}>dist\mjs\package.json
scripts.test-win: npm link && cd .\test\cjs && npm install && npm link opencors && cd .\..\mjs && npm install && npm link opencors
scripts.prepare-win: npm install && npm run build-win && npm run test-win && npm run build
scripts.publish-win: npm run clean-win && npm run build-win && npm publish
